releaseNotes:
New in this update: Gemini 3 Flash arrives on Chat Smith!

Chat Smith is now upgraded with Gemini 3 Flash — delivering next-generation intelligence built for speed and efficiency. Enjoy faster reasoning, deeper understanding, and sharper responses across all your tasks.

Update now to try it.
description:
Meet Chat Smith, your next-generation AI assistant built to think deeper, create faster, and help you achieve more. Built on the latest GPT-5, GPT-4o, GPT-4, Gemini 3, DeepSeek V3, and Grok-4, Chat Smith combines advanced artificial intelligence with powerful AI chat capabilities.

As an AI chatbot and productivity assistant, Chat Smith helps you write, learn, solve problems, and explore ideas effortlessly. Here are the powerful features you can enjoy with Chat Smith:

AI IMAGE GENERATOR
Create stunning AI images in seconds! Using OpenAI GPT-Image, Gemini Nano Banana Pro, and advanced text-to-image technology, Chat Smith turns your prompts or photos into eye-catching AI artwork and high-quality visuals.

AI WRITING ASSISTANT
Generate outlines or paragraphs with an AI essay writer, and craft narratives with an AI story generator built on advanced models GPT-5, Gemini 3, DeepSeek and Grok.

DEEP RESEARCH
Unlock deeper insights with Pro Search and Deep Research powered by advanced AI reasoning. Get accurate answers with sources, citations, and updated reports — perfect for students, analysts, and researchers seeking clarity beyond surface-level information.

VIRTUAL ASSISTANT
Stay productive with an AI assistant that helps you plan tasks, organize ideas, and get things done faster. With instant, reliable answers powered by GPT-5, Gemini 3, DeepSeek, and Grok, Chat Smith makes every workflow quicker and more efficient.

MARKETING ASSISTANT
This AI Chatbot helps you generate ad copy, research insights, SEO keywords, product names, and brand taglines. You can also create engaging social posts, captions, and retweets for Facebook, X, and Instagram with a smart AI caption generator.

REAL-TIME SEARCH
Powered by GPT-5, DeepSeek V3, Grok-4, and Gemini 3, this feature lets you instantly access the latest information online. From breaking news to niche queries, Chat Smith keeps you updated and informed.

EMAIL GENERATOR
Create polished emails in seconds! Whether it’s sales, announcements, or discount messages, Chat Smith makes professional email writing easy.

AI HOMEWORK HELPER
Generate notes, prep for quizzes, and find answers to homework questions with a study assistant. Built on GPT-5, GPT-4o, and GPT-4, Chat Smith also provides a powerful AI Math Solver to help students tackle math problems with step-by-step explanations.

TEXT & VIDEO SUMMARIZER
Turn long documents and notes into concise summaries with key insights. Get instant summaries and translations from any YouTube link using YouTube Summarizer, and quickly summarize, rewrite, or translate any PDF for faster understanding.

AI TRANSLATOR & LANGUAGE PRACTICE
Translate any languages using powerful multilingual capabilities. Perfect for travel, learning, and everyday conversations.

IMAGE ANALYZER
Upload any photo for instant image analysis. Identify objects, places, animals, or text with clear explanations.

TEXT TO SPEECH
Convert text into human-like audio with advanced AI voice technology.

CODE GURU
Generate, debug, explain code or build simple apps using an AI code editor.

AI KEYBOARD
Type faster with AI-powered grammar fixes, predictive typing, auto replies, and autocorrect.
 
GRAMMAR & SPELLING CHECKER
Fix grammar, spelling, and punctuation with AI proofreading tools.

RESUME & CV BUILDER
Generate resume, cover letter, LinkedIn optimization, and interview questions with a built-in AI resume checker.

MOBILE-WEB SYNC
Use Chat Smith on mobile and web with seamless cross-device sync.

You can subscribe to our auto-renewing plans: weekly ($6.99), monthly ($9.99), or yearly ($49.99). After the free trial, payment is charged to your iTunes account. Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the period. Unused trial portions are forfeited after purchase. Manage your subscription in your iTunes Account settings.

Privacy Policy: https://vulcanlabs.co/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://vulcanlabs.co/terms-of-use
Contact: support@vulcanlabs.co
